name: UIDevice
desc: A representation of the current device.

items.name: current
items.desc: Returns an object representing the current device.

items.name: isMultitaskingSupported
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether multitasking is supported on the current device.

items.name: name
items.desc: The name identifying the device.

items.name: systemName
items.desc: The name of the operating system running on the device represented by the receiver.

items.name: systemVersion
items.desc: The current version of the operating system.

items.name: model
items.desc: The model of the device.

items.name: localizedModel
items.desc: The model of the device as a localized string.

items.name: userInterfaceIdiom
items.desc: The style of interface to use on the current device.

items.name: identifierForVendor
items.desc: An alphanumeric string that uniquely identifies a device to the appâ€™s vendor.

items.name: orientation
items.desc: Returns the physical orientation of the device.

items.name: UIDeviceOrientation
items.desc: The physical orientation of the device.

items.name: isGeneratingDeviceOrientationNotifications
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver generates orientation notifications (true) or not (false).

items.name: beginGeneratingDeviceOrientationNotifications
items.desc: Begins the generation of notifications of device orientation changes.

items.name: endGeneratingDeviceOrientationNotifications
items.desc: Ends the generation of notifications of device orientation changes.

items.name: isPortrait
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the device is in a portrait orientation.

items.name: isLandscape
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the device is in a landscape orientation.

items.name: isFlat
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the specified orientation is face up or face down.

items.name: isValidInterfaceOrientation
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the specified orientation is one of the portrait or landscape orientations.

items.name: batteryLevel
items.desc: The battery charge level for the device.

items.name: isBatteryMonitoringEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether battery monitoring is enabled (true) or not (false).

items.name: batteryState
items.desc: The battery state for the device.

items.name: UIDevice.BatteryState
items.desc: The battery power state of the device.

items.name: isProximityMonitoringEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether proximity monitoring is enabled (true) or not (false).

items.name: proximityState
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the proximity sensor is close to the user (true) or not (false).

items.name: playInputClick
items.desc: Plays an input click in an enabled input view.

items.name: UIUserInterfaceIdiom
items.desc: The interface type for the device or an object that has a trait environment, such as a view and view controller.

items.name: UI_USER_INTERFACE_IDIOM
items.desc: Returns the interface idiom supported by the current device (recommended for apps that run in versions of iOS earlier than 3.2).

items.name: batteryLevelDidChangeNotification
items.desc: Posted when the battery level changes.

items.name: batteryStateDidChangeNotification
items.desc: Posted when battery state changes.

items.name: orientationDidChangeNotification
items.desc: Posted when the orientation of the device changes.

items.name: proximityStateDidChangeNotification
items.desc: Posted when the state of the proximity sensor changes.
